column4: Does anybody have an aero theme for gtk-window-decorator that works with compiz?
Does anybody have an aero theme for gtk-window-decorator that works with compiz?
Does anybody have an aero theme for gtk-window-decorator that works with compiz?
you may find better help asking on the forum than posting every 30 seconds
You can help?
no, or I would have done
it's a busy channel, don't take anything personally
what ip are you trying to use
it's probably nothing to do with your ssh setting, more ilkey to do with networking
is this a home broadband/cable connection
yes
ok, the odds are you've not setup port forwarding properly
you know ssh is working, so the issue must be between internal/external IP forwarding
you're currently using vista ?
your client responds as vista
I set it up to do that
can you please show me the output of uname -a please
can you paste the full line please
either way, this isn't an ubuntu issue, as you know ssh is working on your lan
so the problem is between your public ip/forward to your private lan
I've just probed that ip and it's not listening on anything, meaning it's not forwarding to anthing most likley
it doesn't look like it's forwarding
